issue.title: Make arrow buildable with java9
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1355](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1355). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Java9 is almost there, and when trying to compile Arrow with the release candidate, I noticed some maven plugins (checkstyle, assembly) and dependencies (jmockit) not compatible with it.
